name: Median annual salaries of U.S. residing full-time employed doctoral scientists and engineers, by sector of employment, broad field of doctorate, and sex: 2021
description: Median annual salaries of U.S. residing full-time employed doctoral scientists and engineers, by sector of employment, broad field of doctorate, and sex: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: employment_sector_and_field_of_study
variableMeasured.description: Employment sector and field of study hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_all_full_time_employed_median_salary
variableMeasured.description: All Full Time Employed Median Salary

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Median annual salaries are for principal job and are rounded to nearest $1,000. Standard errors are rounded up to the nearest $500. Full time is based on working 35 or more hours per week. Residence location is based on reported living location on 1 February 2021.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2021.
